easy.question: Andorra la Vella is the capital of Andorra. True
Algiers is the capital of Algeria. True
Vienna is the capital of Italy. False
Buenos Aires is the capital of Argentina. True
Athens is the capital of Belgium. False

medium.question: Melbourne is the capital of Australia. False
Sarajevo is the capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina. True
Brasilia is the capital of Brazil. True
Montreal is the capital of Canada. False
Santiago is the capital of Chile. True

difficult.question: Kabul is the capital of Azerbaijan. False
Minsk is the capital of Belarus. True
Kuala Lumpur is the capital of Benin. False
Thimphu is the capital of Bhutan. True
Sucre is the capital of Bolivia. True
